name: Top Loading Water Cooler Water Dispenser Countertop Water Cooler Dispenser- Hot Cold and Room Temperature Water, Holds 1.2 to 5 Gallon Bottles for Home/Office/Dormitory Use
short_description: 【Counter top water dispenser】3 IN 1 Water Dispenser. The water dispenser can make hot, cold, warm water. It can be used in four seasons. With work indicator: Visible working state, easy to know working state. It is small in size and powerful in function. It does not need to be installed and can be moved as you like. The Water Cooler Dispenser is recommended for indoor use at a temperature of higher than 25 degrees Celsius(77 degrees Fahrenheit). 【Hot and cold water cooler dispenser】Heating is rapid, automatic temperature control. Cooling time: 40 minutes,heating time: 6 minutes, The yellow light(COLD) on means it's in preocess of cooling. Getting cold water until the yellow light gets off. (Cooling time: 40 minutes, cooling minimum temperature: ±10℃) When the temp is above about 10℃(there's a eletronic element testing the temp), the yellow light automatically gets on and it's in cooling again. 【Easy to use】One key start, automatic temperature control, easy to use. It can be operated by one hand to complete water intake. Our top loading water cooler dispenser saves time when you need to make a quick cup of tea or instant soup! You never ha ve to wait for a pot or kettle to boil. This water dispenser features a push button faucet making it easy to dispense cold, hot and room-temperature water. 【Health & safety】High quality liner, not easy to scale, safe to drink. Easy to disassemble and clean. Water Leakage Problems. If the faucet leaks, it is the problem of the faucet seal, replace the faucet. If the smart seat leaks, it is because the bucket bottle into the air appear water and then keep down the can, storage tank water level is full overflowing. Just avoid overflowing the water level of the storage tank is too high. After replace the bucket, pour out a few cups of water from cold tap so that the water level can recover. 【Wide Applycation】Countertop Top Loading Water Cooler Dispenser features a compact design. It can be placed in office, in the desk bedside cabinet, tea table, bar, measuring only at 14.2 x 9.5 x 10.6 inches to fit any space. It can put 4.5L-18.9L bottled water.

name: Brita UltraMax Large Water Dispenser With Standard Filter, BPA-Free, Reduces Copper, Cadmium and Mercury Impurities, Lasts 2 Months or 40 Gallons, Includes 1 Filter, Kitchen Accessories, Large 27-Cup
short_description: WATER DISPENSER: One BPA-free, large 27-cup Brita UltraMax Filtered Water Dispenser includes one Standard filter to help remove impurities from your tap water CUTS OUT IMPURITIES: Brita water purifier dispenser cuts the taste and odor of chlorine and also reduces copper, mercury and other impurities SUSTAINABLE: By switching to a Brita water filter system, you can save money and replace up to 1,800 single-use plastic water bottles a year FRIDGE-FRIENDLY: Space-efficient Brita water dispenser is fridge-friendly, and it features an easy-locking lid and precision-pour spigot REPLACEMENT INDICATOR: Sticker filter indicator lets you know when it is time to change your Brita filter WHAT’S INCLUDED: This water dispenser comes with one Standard water filter, which should be changed every 40 gallons or about every two months for best results ELITE FILTER: Compatible with Elite water filters – for the freshest-tasting water, replace your Elite filter after 120 gallons or approximately every six months STANDARD FILTER: Also compatible with Standard filters - change your Standard filter after 40 gallons or approximately every two months
product_description: Drink healthier, great-tasting tap water with the BPA-free, large 27-cup Brita UltraMax Water Dispenser. This water filtration system cuts the taste and odor of chlorine, plus it reduces mercury, copper and other impurities to deliver great-tasting drinking water. By switching to this Brita water purifier, you can replace 1,800 single-use plastic water bottles a year to stay hydrated, save money and reduce plastic waste. This space-efficient Brita water dispenser is fridge-friendly and features an easy-locking lid and precision-pour spigot. The handy sticker filter indicator lets you know when it's time for a filter change. This Brita water dispenser comes with one Standard Brita water filter, but it's compatible with both Elite and Standard water filters. For the freshest-tasting water, replace your Elite filter after 120 gallons or approximately every six months, or replace your Standard filter after 40 gallons or approximately every two months. Get great taste, less waste and more savings from Brita.

name: Top Loading Water Dispenser for 5 Gallon Bottle Water Dispenser Countertop, Holds 1.2 to 5 Gallon Bottles for Home, Office, & More
short_description: 【3-Temperature Water Dispenser – Hot, Cold & Room Temp】Enjoy perfectly customized water anytime with this 5-gallon water dispenser. Get ice-cold water (8-15°C) in seconds for summer refreshment, scalding-hot water (90°C) for tea/coffee (ready in 6-8 mins), or room-temperature water—all with a simple button press. The 304 stainless-steel tank ensures safe, clean drinking water year-round, whether for your home, office, or dorm. 【Top-Loading Design – Fits 1.2 to 5-Gallon Bottles】No heavy lifting or messy spills! This countertop water dispenser features a top-loading system that securely holds standard 5-gallon jugs or compact 1.2-gallon bottles. The tight-seal base blocks dust and contaminants, keeping water hygienic. Compact size (8.6×10.6×14.5 inches) fits small spaces like kitchens, desks, or RVs. 【One-Hand Operation & Easy-Clean Drip Tray】Designed for convenience: Push the large button with one hand while holding your cup—no interruptions during work or chores! The removable drip tray catches spills and fits most cup sizes. Plus, the detachable barrel seat and smooth PP plastic make cleaning a breeze. Perfect for busy homes, offices, or camping trips. 【Fast Heating (550W) & Efficient Cooling (75W)】Powerful 550W heating delivers hot water in under 8 minutes, while the 75W cooling system chills water to 8-15°C in ~40 minutes—energy-efficient for daily use. The 110V/60Hz plug works in standard outlets, and cooling vents prevent overheating. Great for high-traffic spots like studios or break rooms. 【Durable & Safe – Stainless Steel Tank & Shockproof Design】Built to last with food-grade 304 stainless steel (rust-proof, BPA-free) and heat-resistant PP plastic. The shockproof foam packaging prevents shipping damage, and the sturdy base resists tipping. Holds 0.14 gallons of hot water and 0.1 gallons of cold water—ideal for families, small businesses, or dorm rooms.

name: Brita Hub Instant Powerful Countertop Water Filter System, Reduces 70+ Contaminants, 12 Cup Water Reservoir, Includes 6 Month Carbon Block Filter, White, 87340
short_description: BRITA'S BEST FILTER EVER: This unique instant water filtration device provides Brita's best water filtration ever. The Brita Hub filter reduces 70+ contaminants including lead, chlorine, microplastics and more. GREAT TASTE, LESS WASTE: Get great tasting water without the waste. By switching to this Brita water filter dispenser, your family can save money and replace around 1800 single-use plastic water bottles a year. CONVENIENT, EASY SETUP IN MINUTES: No installation or tools required. Simply insert the filter, fill the 12 cup removable reservoir on the countertop water filter, plug in and flush the system twice to begin enjoying. FILTER LASTS 6 MONTHS: Each Brita Hub water filter lasts 6 months and filters 120 gallons of water. When it's time to replace, the filter is easy to change. The machine includes one filter. Additional Brita Hub filters (Model CT01) sold separately. EASY PUSH-BUTTON DISPENSING: Enjoy refreshing water any time with the push of a button. Simply choose between 12 oz. and 20 oz. presets, or use manual mode to fill your glass or bottle. The spout fits glasses and water bottles up to 12" tall.
product_description: The Brita Hub Instant Countertop Water Filtration Device powered by Hamilton Beach uses Brita's best filter ever to reduce 70+ contaminants. It's easy to set up for instant, powerful water filtration. Includes 6 month Brita Hub filter.

With it, you can stop heating or cooling at any time to save electricity and reduce the use of bottled mineral water, contributing to environmental protection Careful Function: After heating or cooling the product, it will continue to maintain insulation. When the water temperature drops below 167 ℉, it will automatically heat up to ensure a continuous supply of hot water, making it more user-friendly.
